author: Giulia McDonnell Nieto del Rio and Ralph Ellis, CNN
title: Rhode Island will knock on doors and stop cars to find New Yorkers to slow coronavirus
description: Rhode Island's governor said Friday that law enforcement officers will stop cars and knock on doors in coastal communities to identify people who've been to New York state, joining other states in restricting the movements of out-of-state visitors to slow the…
